tool_description: Grammar Genius is the latest product by Genius Tools. It helps users correct sentence structure, verb usage, and improve the overall quality of their sentences using state-of-the-art AI technology. While there is no enforced word limit, it is recommended to limit requests to approximately 15,000 words or fewer to avoid timeouts.

api_list.name: Grammar Check
api_list.description: Fix any grammar mistakes in your text.
